properties.name: cat-broker.route.cat-broker.dlq
properties.description: Apache Camel endpoint to send Cat Messages that for some reason cannot be routed to a Cattery Channel.

properties.name: cat-broker.route.cat-broker.cats-r-us
properties.description: Apache Camel endpoint topic for sending Cat Messages onwards to the third party cats-r-us Cattery service.

properties.name: cat-broker.route.cat-broker.from
properties.description: Apache Camel endpoint topic that the cat-broker will route Cat Messages from

properties.name: cat-broker.route.cat-broker.name
properties.description: Name to give the cat broker route in logging etc

properties.name: kafka.serializerClass
properties.description: Serializer class for sending messages via Apache Kafka

properties.name: producer.topic.cats-r-us
properties.description: An Apache Kafka topic for sending Cat Messages onwards to the third party cats-r-us Cattery service.

properties.name: producer.topic.dlq
properties.description: An Apache Kafka topic to send Cat Messages that for some reason cannot be routed to a Cattery Channel.

properties.name: consumer.topic.cat-broker
properties.description: An Apache Kafka topic for sending Cat Messages onwards to the third party cats-r-us Cattery service.
